Default timeout and pretty colors are set in /etc/default/grub. The best way to get rid of old kernel entries is just to remove the old kernel packages.

Sorry, looks like a difference between Debian's default theme setup and Ubuntu's.
Add "menu_color_normal=light-blue/black \n menu_color_highlight=light-cyan/blue" to the end of /etc/grub.d/40_custom
With the "\n" being an actual newline.
